latex:
If $x$ is such that $\dfrac{1}{x}<2$ and $\dfrac{1}{x}>-3$, then:\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ -\dfrac{1}{3}<x<\dfrac{1}{2}  \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\  -\dfrac{1}{2}<x<3 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\  x>\dfrac{1}{2} \qquad\\
\textbf{(D)}\  x>\dfrac{1}{2}\text{ or }-\dfrac{1}{3}<x<0 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\   x>\dfrac{1}{2}\text{ or }x<-\dfrac{1}{3}$
